resources.string: To select one, two or three balls, swipe your fingers over those.
Congratulations, you have succeeded the selection tutorial. You may continue testing if you wish.
Release your finger when you are pleased with your selection.
Now, to choose the movement, keep your finger pressed on one of the balls you have selected.
Keep your finger down while moving it on the screen, and release it when you are pleased with the direction you have selected.
